Name: SlipDream Resonator
About the game: SlipDream Resonator is a futuristic, multi-directional rhythm game with unique twin-stick analogue controls. Inspired by both classic rhythm games and top-down shooters, SlipDream Resonator offers addictive arcade gameplay designed to challenge while featuring eye catching visuals and a heart pumping soundtrack. Integration through Simulation SlipDream is a state of consciousness that allows a person to dream while being fully awake. As an attempt to create a machine that could induce such a state Advara Therapeutics created SlipDream Resonator. The simulated levels embedded within have been programmed to fully activate the user's mind and body through false stimulus and a direct link to our cloud based neural encoder. The path has been laid before you, embodiment is at your fingertips, integration has already begun. 20+ Music based levels SlipDream Resonator features 22 levels each with a unique soundtrack and background visual. With 5 difficulty levels SlipDream is accessible to all skill levels while still offering a challenge to the true die-hards. Power-ups Power-ups have been dispersed in each simulated level to help aid in difficult moments and encourage breakthroughs. The 4 available power-ups are detailed below. Atomic Destroys all spawned notes at once. One time use per activation. Circle Engages every node at once. Useful for sustained notes and breakthrough levels. Three uses per activation Time Temporarily slows down time. One time use per activation Laser Destroys all spawned notes in a specific lane. Three uses per activation Free Play Free Play allows the user to customize their experience with a variety of options, including: Invincibility Slow Mo Powerup Probability Double speed & more
